t: recieves information that this enemy is in some way related to the quest-giver.
experience hallucinations of a terrifying nature.
realize that the situation is not as it first seemed to be.
a secret is found that could destroy the quest-giver's reputation.
are transported to a mysterious land.
recieves information that their quest may be a distraction from something far greater and more dangerous that's happening right under their noses.
someone who the party thought was an enemy may just turn out to be an ally instead.
are aided by a mysterious spirit.
